| The customer has verified the dimensions | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Kangopak will provide the customer with the appropriate die lines based on the specified dimensions | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Material construction confirmed by the customer | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Design or artwork provided by the customer or designer on Kangopakâ€™s die-line for quote requests, and Kangopak verifies as correct for technicalities. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Request a quote from the raw material supplier based on the details above | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Request a quote for origination from the raw material supplier based on the details above. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Receive the quote from the raw material supplier for printed materials | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Receive the quote from the raw material supplier for origination costs. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Send the pouch quote to the customer. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Send the origination cost quote to the customer. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| The customer accepts or rejects the quote. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| The customer sends a purchase order (PO) to Kangopak for plates. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Customer sends PO to Kangopak for Plates | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Pouch Specification Form prepared by Kangopak. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Pouch Specification Form sent to the customer | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Pouch Specification Form signed off by the customer | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Purchase order sent to the raw material supplier for the material | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Purchase order sent to the raw material supplier for the origination. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Die line with artwork sent to the material supplier. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Proof received from the raw material supplier by Kangopak. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Proof sent to the customer from Kangopak. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Customer signs off on the proof. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Customer sends approved proof back to Kangopak | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Kangopak receives the proof back from the customer. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Kangopak sends the approved proof to the raw material supplier. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Raw material supplier confirms the delivery date of the printed material to Kangopak. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| On Press Approval (OPA) scheduled by the raw material supplier; date received by Kangopak. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Date of OPA communicated to the customer. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Customer nominates proxy for OPA (if applicable). | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| OPA Proxy Authorisation Form sent to the customer. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| OPA Proxy Authorisation Form received back from Customer (if applicable) | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| OPA | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Printed material received from the raw material supplier | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Finish Product produced. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
| Finished Product dispatched. | |  |  |  | |  |  |
